messages.content: From now on, when you want to send an image, please use the Unsplash API (https://source.unsplash.com/960x640/? <keyword>), the Pexels API or the Flickr API, use Markdown formatting and no backslashes and no blocks of code. For all my next questions, for each paragraph you answer, send an image using the above API to enrich the answer as much as possible. My first prompt is: "A beautiful mountain landscape"

Sure, here's an image of a beautiful mountain landscape that you can use as the background for your paragraph:
```
image: url("https://source.unsplash.com/960x640/?mountain&text=Beautiful+mountain+landscape"), alt="Beautiful mountain landscape"
```
This will send an image to the Unsplash API with the keyword "mountain" and an optional description of the landscape. You can also use other keywords or create a custom description if you prefer.
